resources.string:
Established in the year 1980 by John Wardle and David Makin, LACC Fashion has long been established as the leading UK specialist retailer of fashionable branded, fashion and trend.

 What started as a single shop in Bury, England has now expanded across the UK, and by 1993, LACC has opened a total of 34 stores. By 2009, LACC has dominated most of the EU, primarily in Ireland, France, Netherlands and Spain, with Denmark and Sweden to follow suit. At this moment in time, LACC was already regarded as the most innovative visual merchandiser of fashionable brand with the best and most exclusive stylish range.

 Fast forward to 2013, LACC officially launched its first store in Asia, right here in Malaysia. In September, LACC opened its first flagship store in Pavilion Elite, Kuala Lumpur, and its third store in Asia in Sunway Velocity, Cheras.

 LACC looks forward to a progressive development in Asia in the days to come.
